title: Samadmalik826
author: Samadmalik826
content: Hello miners,Seeking advice on my 2 Giga Hash rig's profit potential. What coins should I mine? Any tips for efficient results and adapting to market trends?Appreciate your insights—let's learn and profit together!

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: Samadmalik826 on August 22, 2023, 06:19:45 PMHello miners,Seeking advice on my 2 Giga Hash rig's profit potential. What coins should I mine? Any tips for efficient results and adapting to market trends?Appreciate your insights—let's learn and profit together!2 Gigahash of what? You can´t say your 2 Gigahash Rig, because the hashrate depends on the Algo you are mining. So it is more interesting what cards are in this rig.you can watch on miningpoolstats.stream for new and existing coins. You also can see if the coin is traded somewhere and how it is trending the last days.Hashrate.no is good source for standard OC (but for sure this are not the best values) and you can see current trending coins - but you must ignore the power consumption on this site, because they are wrong mostly.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Samadmalik826 on August 22, 2023, 06:19:45 PMHello miners,Seeking advice on my 2 Giga Hash rig's profit potential. What coins should I mine? Any tips for efficient results and adapting to market trends?Appreciate your insights—let's learn and profit together!Did you have 2 GH while mining ethereum?How much do you pay for electricity and what graphics cards do you have?Check out this website https://www.hashrate.no/Unfortunately for many video cards now mining is not profitable or the payback is very long. You will have to independently look for new coins or mine with a minimum profit.
